newArrival.name: Madras Cafe
newArrival.description: An Indian Intelligence agent (John Abraham) journeys into a war torn coastal island, to break a resolute rebel group. He deftly maneuvers his resources to make significant breakthroughs, amidst a scenario where the enemy has no face and the only counsel is 'Don't get caught.' At various junctions, he meets a charismatic and passionate journalist (Nargis Fakhri) who is following her will to reflect the truth behind the civil war. The story unfolds as their quest for the truth reveals a deeper conspiracy, by a faceless enemy, united to seize a common nemesis - India.

newArrival.name: Gavthii
newArrival.description: Gavthi is a story of love, friendship, sacrifice, hard work, and righteousness. Gajanan (Shrikant Patil), son of a farmer Shankar (Kishor Kadam), goes through complex emotions when he goes to Mumbai for a work opportunity, leaving behind his family, friends and his love Gauri (Yogita Chavan) cruel loan shark Babanrao's (Nagesh Bhosale) only daughter. Will Gajanan (Shrikant Patil), a simple village boy, be able to survive in the fast paced city?
